title: PLL Holds Quarantined Championship Tournament
itunes:title: PLL Holds Quarantined Championship Tournament
description:
Premier Lacrosse League Co-Founder Paul Rabil, explains how the logistics of PLL's quarantined championship tournament will work. Rabil says this event could likely set the model for team sports leagues in the near future from a health, safety and execution standpoint

Hosts: Carol Massar and Jason Kelly. Producer: Doni Holloway.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
